title: Which are cutting edge technologies at present? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are Machine learning, 3d printing, rocket technologies, blockchain, metamaterials, cheap renewable energy, better battery and probably many more. There is no single most cutting edge technology. Each would have to complement each other. It's not that you can build a smartphone with just battery, microprocessor or touch-screen technology, but you cannot build that with any missing either. That's why I won't rank any higher.

surely, by definition, everything currently under development? Momentum builds for perovskite tandems, 25%+ efficiency achievedModern Prometheus - Crispr/Cas9 gene editingCould a Single Vaccine Prevent Multiple Diseases Spread by Mosquitoes?Episode 2, Series 2, Trust Me, I'm a Doctor - Can organs be purpose-grown using stem cells? - BBC Twobut you want me to pick just one? - you are going to get a very subjective answer, based as much on my interests as knowledge of the whole of human endeavour. so let’s pick Photocatalytic dissosciation of water to yield Hydrogen: http://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/2399-1984/aa88a1
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Brandon C. Njichop
